elements.label: Claire, an acquaintance
elements.description: Claire Hatchston was recently fired from her decade-long job. Although her spirits are up, she still wants to know how to protect against that which made her leave. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Claire, a believer
elements.description: Claire hugs everyone she considers a friend, and does not shirk from asking questions to those she doesn't.

elements.label: Claire, a disciple
elements.description: Claire is becoming increasingly preoccupied with the concept of protection. She will find out how to defend her allies.

elements.label: Claire, a Tarantellist
elements.description: Claire serenades us often now. When she doesn't, she hums. That's when she is quieter, but somehow that's when we hear her even better.

elements.label: Claire, a Rival
elements.description: Claire is often seen around town, and it's not easy to say anything against her. She holds no such qualms against us.

elements.label: Claire, a Long in the Making
elements.description: Don't worry, munchkin. I'll see to it,' she promises, lovingly, 'that the Bureau treats you nicely. But they will treat you.'

elements.label: Claire, a Prisoner
elements.description: Claire has a way of extracting information, and we don't know how she will use it. Best just not to talk to her.
